website_summaries.verdict: A unique design and sturdy breakaway clasp make this comfortable nylon collar a hit.
pros: Nylon material is not too stiff, making it more comfortable for cats
Fits most adult cats well – adjustable
cons: A few reports of breakaway clasp not working correctly
Some owners are disappointed in lack of reflective material
Nylon gets “fuzzy” after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Ummm...
customer_reviews.text: So the collar did break, but the safety buckle did not come undone. Don't know what happened but I came home to find the collar on the floor next to my window. If you look, the thing is still buckled shut. My cat weighs 8lbs, he's not exactly a bodybuilder. I can only imagine that it got caught when he jumped or something. The whole point of a breakaway collar is so that it unbuckles in case the cat gets stuck. It failed to unbuckle, but I guess I'm happy that it's flimsy enough to break anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Yodels

customer_reviews.title: Works great but without maintaining it the breakaway feature can stick.
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar for my cat and have purchased it several times. However be aware that if you do not take it on and off your cat much, it can start to stick and becomes harder and harder for it to function properly with regards to its break away feature. I recommend taking it off every now and then and make sure its not sticking or has any dirt stuck in it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Fabric, Would Not Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: The material is too soft to be durable. Have you noticed how some nylon/synthetic material for collars is very shiny and soft and some is not as shiny, but tougher? This is made out of the cheap shiny stuff. Six weeks later and he design is hard to make out because it’s covered up by fuzz as the fabric frays. This is not a quality collar and it’s not worth it, even at the cheap price. Oh and also, my cat manages to pop the collar off about once a week. The safety clasp is a little too safe. I don’t remember having this issue with the previous collar I had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to cut off
customer_reviews.text: Bought the collar after Thanksgiving and had to cut it off by Christmas. Cat managed to wedge it into mouth after pulling over jaw, and being unable to inch it in any direction and alleviate kitty's pain, no choice but to cut. Kitty had been wearing an elastic collar for a year with no problem, so I switched right back to elastic. ****It's worth noting that I really like the bell that came with this collar. I switched it to her current collar. I live out in the country, and it's good enough resonance to hear her coming in from the dark at night from a good hundred feet.
customer_reviews.author: o.j.m.

customer_reviews.title: This Collar Makes My Cat Look Bad To The Bones
customer_reviews.text: I really like this collar it makes a statement as my cat struts his stuff. My cat goes outside every morning for a few hours then comes home. We have gone through a lot of these collars as he will come home without it. The breakaway clip must work which is good. I would love to know if is donating them to another cat or is he loosing them in a tree. My only complaint is the two pack is .47 more expensive than buying them by the single.
customer_reviews.author: curtis84095

customer_reviews.title: Feels flimsy, plastic snapped.
customer_reviews.text: The collar was cute and it was always my intention to get a skull and crossbones collar for my cat, Jinx. The collar itself felt a bit flimsy, but the bell was nice. Unfortunately, the plastic adjustable portion snapped while the safety latch remained fastened. I don't know if my cat caught his jaw underneath it (as he has done before) or if it was pulled by anything, but it did not work as it should have. Found it laying on the floor in our mud room when I came home from work. Lasted for all of 2 days. Decided to just go back to the pet store and get the more expensive, sturdier, reflective breakaway collar for him again.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Breaks away when needed.
customer_reviews.text: The collar did what it was supposed to when my cat got caught up on the chair rung playing chase with my other cat. I was able to put it back on her. She is fine and I was able to put the collar back on her because it wasn't ruined. I have a black cat with attitude and this is the coolest collar for her!
customer_reviews.author: CAT60

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: My Boy, LOVES his Collar!!! He always has to have it on.... The only time I take it off is to brush his neck... He knows it is SKULLS AND CROSS BONES, he keeps it on, it is his personality.... I have tried heart collars and duck collars, he pulls them off... This is his look... Total keeper. Easy to Breakaway too... He is MY BOY....
customer_reviews.author: Glitterkitty2

customer_reviews.title: Collar Failure - My Cat Nearly Hung Herself
customer_reviews.text: I feel terrible that I need write this review, but it's necessary after what happened to my cat last week. My cat got her collar stuck on a window blind and when she went to jump off the window sill, the collar never released. Luckily I was home and heard some rustling, and was able to force the collar off. Lucy coughed a few times and seemed traumatized from the incident, but ultimately she was okay. The collar didn't come off easily and I'm truly worried what would have happened if I wasn't home or if I was asleep when this occurred. Please test the collar out and make sure it easily comes off before putting it on your pet.
customer_reviews.author: paul gablin

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well but won’t breakaway
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kitten as he was growing into adulthood it has grown quite nicely with him. It has also held up pretty well without shredding. Update: my cat has had this collar for 10 months now.. still great condition but it will not breakaway. The way the plastic wears down it basically makes a lip that locks itself together. It’s a big safety risk for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Delanie Rock

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight collar
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, decent cat collar. The breakaway clasp works and our old hefty cat has left it on his neck. The bell was immediately removed before it was placed on him - the metal piece holding it is cheap and wouldn’t hold a name tag.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Miller

customer_reviews.title: I'll pass, not terrible but not great
customer_reviews.text: It was a good collar, it seemed durable, he kept it for a while. The issue I have is the break away clasp, you have to pull hard to get it to open and you end up choking your cat for a second.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't ask the cat..
customer_reviews.text: This collar is pretty good, not super heavy duty though. Itchy cat doesn't appreciate it or the bell, but she got used to it. Great feature is it will break away rather than choking cat to death if they get "caught up". Love the design, fitting for our cat.
customer_reviews.author: ALICAT123

customer_reviews.title: Bell helps cut down on "gifts"
customer_reviews.text: This dual function collar serves the purpose of both proudly declaring your cat is a dangerous killer to be feared by all while also giving fair warning to potential murder victims that death stalks nearby. I can attest not all victims will heed this warning. This bell has held up for several months whereas our previous one (different brand) rusted & stopped jingling, so 5 stars for quality there. Also, I can tell he feels like a sharp dressed cat in this, and what cat doesn't want that?
customer_reviews.author: Jason T Cardin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collar that doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described. It looks awesome on my kitten and is adjustable so he will be able to wear it for a long time. The break away clip reassures me that my fur baby will be safe. The bell can be easily detached if it bothers you, and reattached as well. My kitten seems to like it as well. ** I have to edit my review, not even 6 months and the plastic buckle has broken. Very sad because it was so cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie A

customer_reviews.title: A Little Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed with this collar. The material began to fray within a week and has lost most of it's color. A 14 year old cat that isn't very active shouldn't have worn this out that quickly. I'll keep looking for a suitable collar.
customer_reviews.author: walla2k5

customer_reviews.title: I love it, Gilly is apathetic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat to match her bad attitude. It's great! The only thing I personally didn't like was that the bell was hooked to the only hook that there is to put tags on, and since I wanted to take the bell off, I had to cut it off since I still wanted to use and not ruin the hook.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Barnett

customer_reviews.title: its a collar
customer_reviews.text: Makes my Kitty look like a bad ass with her Skull collar. It's a breakaway collar but she has been rocking it for a month or so and its never popped off. The bell is a nice touch. It's pretty quite and give just a little jingle. Give my 95 lbs black lab (and myself) a little warning when ninja kitty is trying to sneak up on us.
customer_reviews.author: RTG

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice and just what we needed. Thought Miss Wonderful would not like the bell, but she actually seems to really like it! It makes her more playful?! Collar will break apart if gets snagged on branch etc so takes worry out of it. Awesome! Happy.
customer_reviews.author: TheCount

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Large section is worn down or not printed correctly. Not eligible for a return.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wittlinger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Had this on my shop cat for a couple months. Works great and love the design.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher Auto

customer_reviews.title: Puuuuurfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this collar, it is a safety color but it's more difficult to pull off than most. If your cat gets stuck they definitely won't get choked, but it's not likely to just slip off either.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: The girls at the vet office love it too
customer_reviews.text: My cat already knows he's the head of the neighborhood cat association, but with this, all the other cats can be sure that he means business. The girls at the vet office love it too, they call him the rock star kitty. The fabric holds up well to Flash's continual rolling in the dust and gravel, and the breakaway clip is the perfect tension for him (he's about 13 pounds). He's lost one squeezing under a fence already, but that's exactly what the safety collar concept is about, and I found it a few days later and saved it for the next time he sheds one in a daring escape.
customer_reviews.author: Read Handed Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great collar, but cat can tighten it
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bright colors on this collar and the fact that the material was smooth so my cat doesn't scratch at it as much. Unfortunately I have a unique problem which means my cat can probably not wear it. My other cat likes to groom him and also bite and pull at his collar - I've found that she's able to "adjust" it to be too tight by pulling at it in the spot between the adjustment slide and the clasp, and it doesn't release when she does this. I'm worried she will be able to tighten it too much with her pulling and choke the other cat.
customer_reviews.author: A Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Coolest cat collar!
customer_reviews.text: Love the print! Other collars have irritated my cat’s neck but zero problems with this one. This is the second one we have bought- 5e original collar still looked good but was fraying a bit (my cat is pretty active) so I replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: MollySchreiber

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I got a little skull name tag too. Update: just ordered a second one cause my cat scratched up the first one! Still love it!
customer_reviews.author: CherryD

customer_reviews.title: Great, safe collar
customer_reviews.text: I just couldn't see my aggressive, attitudinal cat with pink glitter and bows, so this is the perfect collar for her. It will grow with her, and I can leave it on her knowing that it is perfectly safe. I did have to remove the bell. She went crazy trying to bite and grab it. But she is an indoor cat, so the bell isn't necessary. Not to mention, I wouldn't get much sleep with it jingling all night. But it is a real conversation piece and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fran Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Have been pleased with this color. It doesn't show any signs of wear and tear. It hasn't frayed or started coming apart at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Catwoman 24

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: We love this collar. We've purchased 3 so far for all our cats. Only one has snapped off so far (and thank goodness it did as our cat went roaming and got stuck!) Over time the collar does fade but that's to be expected. We paid $3 more for our newest one (the other two were a little cheaper) but still a great deal for a good quality color (and the pattern is awesome.)
customer_reviews.author: Faith N

customer_reviews.title: Functional, lasts about 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: The bell and the collar itself are perfectly fine. I love the design but my cats white hair has started to turn the design white. I'm not sure how or if I can clean it? The other thing I don't care for is how difficult it is to get the collar off.
customer_reviews.author: KaitLeit

customer_reviews.title: Don't count on it being safe
customer_reviews.text: Like another poster, I found my cat with the collar stuck around his head and mouth like a gag. The safety breakaway is not, not, not a thing. Returning cuz I was pretty horrified to see my lil boy stuck like that. :`(
customer_reviews.author: Dee Flaten

customer_reviews.title: The collar breaks away as expected and not too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Our little black kitten's personality fits the skull design perfectly. The collar breaks away as expected and not too easily.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Know where your little pirate is.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly adjustable. My black kitty looks like a pirate! The bell is great as he'd hide when we first rescued him and could find him easily) and now still nice to know where he is. Also I like the size - just a small strip of material. Doesn't seem to bother him at all.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Yarr me kitty be liking it matey
customer_reviews.text: She loves it, I love it. The saftey feature is nice, I already found it twice stuck in air vents and my cat just going around like nothing happened. 4 stars due to the color fading somewhat quickly
customer_reviews.author: Glen K.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfort
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute but also comfortable to the touch. It’s important to me that my cat isn’t irritated by the material. I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Good collar. After having a non-safety collar and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Good collar. After having a non-safety collar and my cat getting is teeth stuck in it, I will never buy one without this feature again. However, taking off a star because my kitten is very easily able to break the collar off. Maybe would be better if it was a little tougher for him to get off and use as a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Couch

customer_reviews.title: Good collar
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and has been on our cat for over two months with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: ManderPants

customer_reviews.title: Really cute collar for my cat
customer_reviews.text: First off, the product came really fast and the seller answered all my questions. The material the collar is made from doesn't feel tough but soft and flexible and the collar is adjustable. I love the safety breakaway, my cat actually took it off himself with his paw because i had it too loose on him. He has never worn a collar but is getting used to it quite well. The little bell is cute and everyone can hear when he's coming, it's so funny. I would definitely recommend this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Katxmea

customer_reviews.title: I really like that it breaks away as it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Pirate skull cat collar. How badass is that! I really like that it breaks away as it's supposed to, not too easily, and certainly not dangerously late. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute except my cat chewed the clasp. I'll be buying a metal.clasp collar next time. Other wise I loved this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Keilei Schlotthauer

customer_reviews.title: I had the kitten-sized collar of this and loved it so much I bought the same one when ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the kitten-sized collar of this and loved it so much I bought the same one when he outgrew it. I've never had any problems with this collar. The breakaway clasp is a little difficult to get on/off but that's a good thing so it won't slip off easily but with a little force it would definitely "break free".
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Goat collars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby goats. Works well. If they get caught on things (as they do all the time) it pops off instead of getting them hung up. The bell is pretty good for keeping track of them. It's rather comical to hear a bunch of little bells ringing in the barn yard as the little kids are all playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy (Boogie) King

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the design and the look of this collar
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the design and the look of this collar, but the plastic broke pretty quickly after I bought it. It was my cat's first collar and he might have chewed it, so I'm not sure if it's a faulty product or if my cat is just a monster. All in all though, I was really happy with this for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: plus a cat with a skull smile collar is just cool.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat really is not thrilled regardless of what collar we get him, however he minds this one less than the others, For the cat: it is a breakaway collar and will not harm him. For us: thing to make sure he has a tag and that it is safe for him, plus a cat with a skull smile collar is just cool.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Judson

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: My kitty doesn’t like collars, but he looks darn cool in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Hyman

customer_reviews.title: 3 days after wearing the collar my cat (who dislikes ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 days after wearing the collar my cat (who dislikes collars) slipped in over her bottom jaw and it got stuck on her tooth. I was unable to pull it off even though it is supposed to be a safety collar. I had to cut it with scissors. The collar was properly fit to her neck, she just really hates collars. I always buy safety collars so that she won’t get stuck, but this one did not release as it should have.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica French

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly bad quality carabin that locks it
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly bad quality carabin that locks it. My cat was able to bite it couple of time and get it off him. Looks pretty useless to me. He is using it like a toy now though.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Saranina

customer_reviews.title: Cute & soft
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, soft and practical. I took the bell off of it though, my cat didn't like the bell. Damien gets what he wants lol.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Marie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: He-Man loves this! It’s not too tight and it’s not too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn C

customer_reviews.title: Love it but..
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and it works fine but my cats scratch at their neck and it frays terribly. Loose threads hanging from the band now.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: My cat, always getting into tight spots, got the collar caught but it broke away as it was supposed to & he was unharmed. I had to remove the little bell because he didn't like it but other than that, my little tough guy looks very cute in his skull & crossbones collar.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my Maine Coon, who is ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Maine Coon, who is aggressive with the other cats. Now they can hear him coming. And the skulls are cute!
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Fan

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like the collar
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like the collar. It looked nice when new. However, it started fraying within only a couple of months of use. Now the design is unrecognizable and the material is frayed through and through.
customer_reviews.author: eniparadoxgma

customer_reviews.title: Serious safety issue
customer_reviews.text: The break away is not working, that’s a serious safety issue for your cat! I had to cut the collar off my cat. In addition the fabric is cheap, it started fading after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: MyReview

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cat Collar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cat collar. We got the skull print for our small cat named Slash. He has no issues wearing it. Easily adjustable. He pulled on the bell a little the first couple of days, but hasn't touched it for weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Luv 4 Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Stays in place! My cat is a busy-body! Gets into and under, everything! Hasn’t popped off once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It breaks
customer_reviews.text: I recieved on April 8th. today may 12th 30ish days later it broke. It is suppose to have the safety feature so that if it gets stuck or snagged it will release. Our 5 mo th old cat got stuck and was able to break free. But In stead of the safety feature releasing the buckle broke. Sad, I really like the look but seems to be cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's cute but it didn't fit my cat, have to wait for him to grow into it
customer_reviews.author: kittymagik

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for. Works well for my in/out cat
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Works well for my in/out cat
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Great collar. Makes my obese indoor cat look like a real tough.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Cute on a white cat
customer_reviews.text: Cute on a white cat. I removed the bell and my cat took the to the collar right away. Easily adjustable, and the break-away feature may save your cat for another day if the collar ever gets hung up on something. Not for a leash or tying a cat outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar, made well & looks awesome on my little black kitty!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Suits my cat well!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my kittens personality perfectly! A little difficult to pull the breakaway part apart.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PERODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THIS COLLAR BUT, UNFORTUNATELY I CAN'T USE IT ON MY OUTSIDE CAT WHO I ORDERED IT FOR SINCE HE HAS LEARNED HOW TO BREAK OUT OF THE BREAK AWAY COLLARS AN HOUR AFTER WE PUT THEM ON HIM
customer_reviews.author: ANN BASTIEN

customer_reviews.title: My kitty Dean won't wear a leather collar--she puts on the best show of it being too unbearably heavy
customer_reviews.text: Cute cute cute little collar! My kitty Dean won't wear a leather collar--she puts on the best show of it being too unbearably heavy. But she likes this collar! And the little skulls are adorable, too.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar.
customer_reviews.text: The price is right and kitty has that bad girl look that I know she desired. Or at least, the permanent look on her face seems to indicate thats her attitude. The bell works without being too annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in the Big O

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and price
customer_reviews.text: My kitten didn't like it, he is not used to something around his neck, but the product is a excellent product itself , light weight , soft material
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved
customer_reviews.text: My cat is always taking off his collar and conveniently leaving them somewhere. So far this one he has left on.... So far.... Fingers Crossed.
customer_reviews.author: april foxlee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sigh....too big for my kitten. It is for adult cats. I had to cut it off my kitten, it was too big and his jaw got stuck. I will definitely purchase another one. Great pattern for my black kitten.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey F

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Easy to adjust and I love the clasping mechanism! It doesnt come apart too easily like the last three our cat eventually lost, but comes free if tugged at all for the safety of our furry family member, Alfred. The skull and crossbones print is brilliant. I highly recommend this cat collar!
customer_reviews.author: MetalMonroe

customer_reviews.title: but if you act like a cat and jerk it to open it
customer_reviews.text: VERY hard to get off... but if you act like a cat and jerk it to open it, it works easy :)
customer_reviews.author: Iggy

customer_reviews.title: Searched Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this collar from a small boutique, and when it wore out, looked everywhere for another. I finally found your advertisement on Amazon and bought it immediately. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good! Had to take the bell off because my ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good! Had to take the bell off because my cat never wore a collar before and it freaked him out. But he still has it on, sans bell.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Anderson

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, and is decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have an indoor/outdoor cat who has managed to get out of every collar we have bought except this one. It stays on, looks nice, and is decent quality for the price. I plan on purchasing more for my other cats.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great collar!
customer_reviews.text: Easily the best cat collar ever! Perfect fit and as stylish as a collar could be.The cat and I both thank you!
customer_reviews.author: the briz

customer_reviews.title: This did not breakaway and my cat had it stuck ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not breakaway and my cat had it stuck in his mouth for hours until I came home. Dangerous product.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey smith

customer_reviews.title: its very comfortable and easy for her to wear
customer_reviews.text: kitty wearing all the time, its very comfortable and easy for her to wear; keeps my birds alive.
customer_reviews.author: cathy wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for my cat, not too big, soft material, cool design. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Not so safe cat
customer_reviews.text: I can't even pull it apart so I don't know how this would prevent my cat from strangling.
customer_reviews.author: K. Irish

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, second one we purchased
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, second one we purchased. Some breakaway collars fall off all the time. This one stays on and only comes off when it's supposed to. Purchased the skull and bones version
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Kitten/cat collar
customer_reviews.text: Great collar, it fits my kitten and will grow with him. I like the bell on it so I elbow where he is. I got the pirate skull print so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: Great cat collar!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collar for my adult cat. It's pliable enough that it doesn't bother him. The design is really cute!
customer_reviews.author: GA Girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute, safe for kitty!
customer_reviews.text: So cute on my kitty, Caliope! She's a hurricane sandy rescue from Brooklyn, so I had to give her some street cred with skulls! 😉 I love that it's a safe breakaway collar, the size is nicely adjustable, and the bell is barely noticeable. It's important that we have a bell of some sort as the poor dear is still very skittish from being on the streets for months her first four-six moths of her life. She's gotten much better, but still often runs and hides when she hears a new voice in the house or something spooks her (as often happens with cats), the slight jingle of the bell helps us locate her to comfort her. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Cat collar that is cool and safe.
customer_reviews.text: This collar looks great and is very well made. It is also a break away collar so you don't have to worry about the collar getting hung up on something and hurting (or worse) your cat. It will break away in such situations.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes my sweet cat look like a real bad a**
customer_reviews.author: KAH

customer_reviews.text: This has lasted longer than the previous one we purchased at a local store. It also seems to not bother my cat.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cute. Cat has no problems with it either. adding on that it broke within the year. plastic buckle snapped apart.

customer_reviews.title: Love this collar
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar. My cat is about 16-17 lbs and loves going outdoors. He generally spends 3-4 hrs outdoors a day and this collar has held up beautifully!

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My young cat was able to pop this off every 2 days or so. But by 10 days she stopped(apparently she likes it) Nice safety feature. She looks good in the pirate motif. Recommended!

product_meta.title: Safe Cat Fashion Adjustable Breakaway Cat Safety Collar with Bell, Skulls, Girth 8-12 Inches x 3/8" Width (1-Unit)
product_meta.description: This Fashion Adjustable Breakaway Cat Collar is lightweight and durable with a breakaway buckle for cat safety and a color-coordinating bell for style. Adjusts from 8-12". This collar is designed to release if a cat's collar gets caught, allowing it to slip-free and stay safe. Do not use with leash or tie-out. White skulls printed on a black background and matching black bell included. 3/8" Width (1-Unit)
feature_bullets: (1-Unit) Coastal Pet Safe Cat Fashion cat collar 3/8 Wide by adjustable girth of 8-12"
Lightweight and durable with a breakaway buckle for cat safety and a color-coordinating bell for style
This collar is designed to release if a cat's collar gets caught, allowing it to slip-free and stay safe.
Soft, comfortable and stylish, ideal for fashionable cats and everyday use
Design: While skulls on a black background. Do not use with leash or tie-out.
